spell.spellbladenext.righteousfervor.des: Buff yourself to make your non holy spells deal an additional 25% of their damage as holy damage, which can't be scaled further.
spell.spellbladenext.risingflames.name: Rising Flames
spell.spellbladenext.risingflames.descri: Blast an enemy {damage} fire damage, stacking 5% Spell Haste and Fire Spell Power per hit.
spell.spellbladenext.ashes.name: Ashes of the Stars
spell.spellbladenext.ashes.description: Passive: Your attacks deal 100% of your arcane attribute as extra damage. While equipped, gain 1 level of Arcane Infusion for every 2 frost or fire attributes. Active: Spin, dealing {damage} arcane damage per second. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.name: Rending Winds
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyreflect.descr: Spin up a gust of wind, dealing heavy knockback and {damage} physical damage to the target enemy, while reflecting incoming projectiles.
spell.spellbladenext.frostborn.name: Frozen Arena
spell.spellbladenext.frostborn.descripti: Conjure an arena of frost around yourself, immobolizing nearby enemies for 2 seconds or until they break free (shift).
spell.spellbladenext.frostslam.name: Glacial Hammer
spell.spellbladenext.frostslam.descripti: Perform a mighty blow with your frozen weapon, dealing 2x melee damage.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyspin.name: Monkey King's Reckoning
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyspin.descript: Spin, dealing 1.5x melee dps to nearby enemies. Penalty for hitting multiple enemies. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyslam.name: Trickster King
spell.spellbladenext.monkeyslam.descript: Leap into the clouds, becoming invulnerable while channeling.
spell.spellbladenext.splitleft.name: Trickster Clone
spell.spellbladenext.splitleft.descripti: Shed a part of yourself and gain the Invisible effect for 8 seconds. This clone lasts 16 seconds, gains half your attack damage, attacks enemies you have attacked within the last 8 seconds, and follows your gaze when it has no target.
spell.spellbladenext.backstab.name: Assassinate
spell.spellbladenext.backstab.descriptio: Passive: Attacks from behind are Sneak Attacks, which always crit with triggered spells. Active: Cast on a target enemy to teleport behind them and deliver a Sneak Attack. Cast without a target to make your next blow a Sneak Attack.
spell.spellbladenext.steelblade.name: Pure Steel
spell.spellbladenext.steelblade.descript: Passive: Deal {damage} extra physical damage on hit. Behaves as a spell rather than an attack for critical strike purposes.
spell.spellbladenext.searingblade.name: Searing Steel
spell.spellbladenext.searingblade.descri: Passive: Deal {damage} extra fire damage on hit. Behaves as a spell rather than an attack for critical strike purposes.
spell.spellbladenext.gleamingblade.name: Gleaming Steel
spell.spellbladenext.gleamingblade.descr: Passive: Deal {damage} extra arcane damage on hit. Behaves as a spell rather than an attack for critical strike purposes.
spell.spellbladenext.frozenblade.name: Cold Steel
spell.spellbladenext.frozenblade.descrip: Passive: Deal {damage} extra frost damage on hit. Behaves as a spell rather than an attack for critical strike purposes.
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.name: Inferno
spell.spellbladenext.inferno.description: Passive: You deal 100% of your fire attribute as damage on hit. Can crit. Active: Spin in a direction, dealing {damage} fire damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting enemies gives you Infusion buffs, up to 5 stacks. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.2hslam.name: Slam
spell.spellbladenext.2hslam.description: Slam with your weapon, dealing 2x melee damage to enemies in an area.
spell.spellbladenext.1hslam.name: Slam
spell.spellbladenext.1hslam.description: Slam with your weapon, dealing 2x melee damage to enemies in an area.
spell.spellbladenext.riposte.name: Riposte
spell.spellbladenext.riposte.description: Enter a defensive stance, parrying incoming attacks, immediately performing a counterattack upon successful parry. Deals melee damage.
spell.spellbladenext.roll.name: Tactical Dive
spell.spellbladenext.roll.description: Dive forward, parrying incoming attacks, immediately performing a counterattack upon successful parry. Deals 1.5x melee damage.
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.name: Whirlwind
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind.descripti: Spin, dealing 3x melee damage to nearby enemies. Penalty for hitting multiple enemies. 0.2x modifier for spell on hit effects. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.dualwield_whirlwind: Spin, dealing one handed (1.5x) or dual wielding (variable) melee dps to nearby enemies. Penalty for hitting multiple enemies. 0.2x modifier for spell on hit effects. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.whirlwind_polearm.d: Spin, dealing 3x melee dps to nearby enemies. Penalty for hitting multiple enemies. 0.2x modifier for spell on hit effects. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.cyclone.name: Cyclone
spell.spellbladenext.cyclone.description: Passive: You deal 100% of your frost attribute as damage on hit. Can crit. Active: Spin in a direction, dealing {damage} frost damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting enemies gives you Infusion buffs, up to 5 stacks. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.name: Maelstrom
spell.spellbladenext.maelstrom.descripti: Passive: You deal 100% of your arcane attribute as damage on hit. Can crit. Active: Spin in a direction, dealing {damage} arcane damage per second to nearby enemies. Hitting enemies gives you Infusion buffs, up to 5 stacks. Shift to stop moving.
spell.spellbladenext.coldfury.name: Frost Flurry
spell.spellbladenext.coldfury.descriptio: Project a frozen statue in the direction you are facing, which stops after a certain distance or when it collides with something, dealing {damage} frost damage repeatedly.
spell.spellbladenext.multicoldfury.name: Frozen Legion
spell.spellbladenext.multicoldfury.descr: Project four frozen statue in four different directions, each one stops after a certain distance or when it collides with something, dealing {damage} frost damage repeatedly.
spell.spellbladenext.fireoverdrive.name: Flame Overdrive
spell.spellbladenext.fireoverdrive.descr: Perform a nova, dealing {damage} fire damage to enemies around you, and giving yourself a stacking attack speed buff. Can be triggered on hit.
spell.spellbladenext.frostoverdrive.name: Frost Overdrive
spell.spellbladenext.frostoverdrive.desc: Perform a nova, dealing {damage} frost damage to enemies around you, and giving yourself a stacking attack speed buff. Can be triggered on hit.
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneoverdrive.des: Perform a nova, dealing {damage} arcane damage to enemies around you, and giving yourself a stacking attack speed buff. Can be triggered on hit.
spell.spellbladenext.fireinfusion.name: Flame Infusion
spell.spellbladenext.fireinfusion.descri: Passive: You deal 2/3 of your fire attribute on hit. Can crit. Active: Infuse your sword, gaining a stacking +2 fire attribute buff. This buff stacks and refreshes on hit up to 3 times.
spell.spellbladenext.frostinfusion.name: Frost Infusion
spell.spellbladenext.frostinfusion.descr: Passive: You deal 2/3 of your frost attribute on hit. Can crit. Active: Infuse your sword, gaining a stacking +2 frost attribute buff. This buff stacks and refreshes on hit, up to 3 times.
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneinfusion.name: Arcane Infusion
spell.spellbladenext.arcaneinfusion.desc: Passive: You deal 2/3 of your arcane attribute on hit. Can crit. Active: Infuse your sword, gaining a stacking +2 arcane attribute buff. This buff stacks and refreshes on hit up to 3 times.
spell.spellbladenext.magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
spell.spellbladenext.magic_missile.descr: Shoot a projectile that shortly splits into three homing projectile. These projectiles target the three closest enemies if no target is chosen. Each projectile deals {damage} damage.
spell.spellbladenext.shadeslash.name: Arcane Twinslash
spell.spellbladenext.shadeslash.descript: Slash around you at your location as well as at the targeted location, dealing {damage} arcane damage per slash.
spell.spellbladenext.multislash.name: Multislash
spell.spellbladenext.multislash.descript: Slash around you at your location as well as at two locations 2 blocks forward and to each side, dealing {damage} arcane damage per slash.
spell.spellbladenext.opportunity.name: Opportunity Attack
spell.spellbladenext.opportunity.descrip: Raise your shield and weapon in a defensive stance, blocking front attacks. If an enemy moves in front of you, it and nearby enemies are dealth 2x melee damage.
spell.spellbladenext.transmute_fire.name: Transmute Copper
spell.spellbladenext.transmute_fire.desc: Transmute a single block of copper into four runeblaze ingots.
spell.spellbladenext.transmute_frost.des: Transmute a single block of iron into four runefrost ingots.
spell.spellbladenext.transmute_arcane.de: Transmute a single block of gold into four runegleam ingots.
spell.spellbladenext.soulfire.name: Burning Spirit
spell.spellbladenext.soulfire.descriptio: Refresh and gain a stack of Burning Spirit for 10 seconds. Each stack of Burning Spirit gives you 1 extra fire power. When you reach over 5 stacks, you burn and take increasing fire damage per stack every second.
spell.spellbladenext.mulberry.name: A Mulberry is a Tree...
spell.spellbladenext.mulberry.descriptio: Conjure your Spirit Sword. Gain a stack of Burning Spirit for 10 seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.magma_orb.name: Magma Orb
spell.spellbladenext.magma_orb.descripti: Launch a Magma Orb that deals {damage} fire damage in an area when it bounces.
spell.spellbladenext.sonic_boom.name: Sonic Boom
spell.spellbladenext.sonic_boom.descript: Unleash a Sonic Boom in the targeted direction, dealing {damage} arcane damage to enemies in line of sight, half to enemies behind walls.
spell.spellbladenext.glacial_barrage.des: Launch a barrage of Icicles as you channel, dealing {damage} frost damage per second.
spell.spellbladenext.horizontal_eruption: Unleash a devastating wave of embers. Each flame deals {damage} fire damage.
spell.spellbladenext.vertical_eruption.d: Unleash a devastating column of embers. Each flame deals {damage} fire damage
spell.spellbladenext.icicle_barrier.name: Icestorm
spell.spellbladenext.icicle_barrier.desc: Create Icicles that orbit you in a spiral, dealing {damage} frost damage every 0.5 seconds and disappearing after 2 seconds.
spell.spellbladenext.arctic_winds.name: Arctic Winds
spell.spellbladenext.arctic_winds.descri: Enter a stance that releases glacial winds expanding outwards from your location, dealing {damage} frost damage every second.
spell.spellbladenext.amethyst_rain.name: Amethyst Rain
spell.spellbladenext.amethyst_rain.descr: Launch four Amethysts into the air that slow down to a halt, and then home into the nearest enemy, each dealing {damage} arcane damage.
spell.spellbladenext.flicker_strike.name: Flickering Flame
spell.spellbladenext.flicker_strike.desc: Teleport to the nearest enemy, striking them repeatedly for 1x melee DPS if they are the only enemy nearby. If there are more enemies nearby, you teleport to all of them equally. 0.2x modifier for spell on hit effects.
spell.spellbladenext.flame_winds.name: Scorching Wind
spell.spellbladenext.flame_winds.descrip: Launch a sphere of scorching air in a direction, dealing {damage} fire damage per second to enemies caught in it and carrying them in the direction of the wind.
spell.spellbladenext.endersgaze.name: Ender's Gaze
spell.spellbladenext.endersgaze.descript: Shoot a slow moving ender pearl. The first enemy hit gains five rotating ender eyes for 4 seconds, each dealing {damage} arcane damage every two-fifths of a second. If the enemy dies, the eyes detach, refreshing their durations if they find new hosts.
spell.spellbladenext.visionofender.name: Visions of Ender
spell.spellbladenext.visionofender.descr: Nearby enemies gain five rotating ender eyes for 2 seconds, each dealing {damage} arcane damage every two-fifths of a second. If the enemy dies, the eyes detach, refreshing their durations if they find new hosts.
spell.spellbladenext.supernova.name: Supernova
spell.spellbladenext.supernova.descripti: Charge up and release a devastating supernova at your location, dealing {damage} fire damage to enemies in the area.
spell.spellbladenext.snowball_bombardmen: Channel to summon three snowballs that rotate around you every 1/4 second. These snowballs orbit once and then launch themsenves into the sky towards a random enemy in the direction you are looking, dealing {damage} frost damage.
spell.spellbladenext.chain.name: Chain
spell.spellbladenext.chain.description: Your arrows chain to nearby enemies twice, possibly hitting the first enemy twice.
spell.spellbladenext.multishot.name: Multishot
spell.spellbladenext.multishot.descripti: When you shoot an arrow, you shoot up to two more arrows at nearby enemies.
spell.spellbladenext.primordialburst.des: 33% chance on arrow hit to trigger an elemental nova. Each element has a separate 2 second cooldown.
spell.spellbladenext.barrage.name: Hailstorm
spell.spellbladenext.barrage.description: Channel to continuously shoot arrows. These arrows deal base physical projectile damage equal to your Frost attribute. This bow can contain up to two additional effects via the Spell Binding Table.
spell.spellbladenext.explosion.name: Combust
spell.spellbladenext.explosion.descripti: Summon a delayed explosion at the target or target enemy, dealing up to {damage} damage at the center of the explosion to ALL enemies except you.
spell.spellbladenext.defiance.name: Endurance
spell.spellbladenext.defiance.descriptio: Upon being hit, you gain a level of Regeneration, up to IV, for two seconds. Use to immediately get Regeneration IV for 2 seconds. Does not passively work while on cooldown.
spell.spellbladenext.courage.name: Courage
spell.spellbladenext.courage.description: You passively gain up to Resistance III, one level every 4 seconds. Getting hit makes you lose a level of Resistance, after the hit. Use to immediately get Resistance III. Does not passively work while on cooldown.
spell.spellbladenext.determination.name: Determination
spell.spellbladenext.determination.descr: Give yourself a bunch of combat buffs. If you die while off cooldown, incurs a longer cooldown to prevent yourself from dying and apply the buffs for 8 seconds. You take heavy damage after 8 seconds.
enchantment.spellbladenext.spellshield.d: Cast your main hand spell upon blocking direct attackers.
